div.strong: If you have any problems understanding this letter or your present position, do not hesitate to contact the Registrar of the Academy.
div.p: Despite having received a warning letter previously you continued to miss working hours at your internship and you are herewith issued with the 2nd and final warning
Your present absences accumulate to: No hrs.
div.strong: Should you miss more than 10% of your Internship periods during the semester you will be suspended and this semester will be invalidated.
div.p: We hope that you understand the seriousness of your present position. We hope you will make the necessary adjustment and present yourself as a worthy student of the Academy displaying professional work attitude and not jeopardizing further internship places for upcoming generation of students.
